derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English pellicane, via late Latin from Greek pelekan, probably based on pelekus 'axe' (with reference to its bill)

encyclopedia.content: 简介 PELICAN：中文音译“派力肯、百利能”或意译“塘鹅”，是国际顶级防爆电筒和防水安全箱的制造商。 创始人 Pelican™ Products 的创始人兼董事长 Dave Parker 11 岁时就成为一名狂热的潜水员，其足迹已经遍布世界上大部分国外潜水俱乐部。在他多年的潜水经历中 Dave 多次发现他需要一些工具来完成潜水过程，但是却无法得到。于是，他闪过一个念头"如果我需要此类东西，那么我敢打赌，其他潜水者也会需要！&quot

entry.def: A pelican is a type of large water bird. It catches fish and keeps them in the bottom part of its beak which is shaped like a large bag.

means.word_mean: 1. large long-winged warm-water seabird having a large bill with a distensible pouch for fish
